fullplot: A girl is mysteriously killed after recording herself playing with an ancient Ouija Board, which leads to a close group of friends to investigate this board. They later find out that some things aren't meant to be played with, especially the 'other side'.
plot: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.
title: Ouija

tomatoes.consensus: Slowly, steadily, although no one seems to be moving it in that direction, the Ouija planchette points to NO.
